channel.title: How do you make NPCs talk?
channel.description: How do you make NPCs talk? I just want mine to give directions for an Xmas event i'm holding on my server.

item.title: How do you make NPCs talk?
item.dc:creator: @akl akl
item.description:
@akl wrote:

Hey are you Miss Silabs cousin or sister… cause we were just gettting enoght of her iuntil you came lol (Sorry for the offtopic)

item.title: How do you make NPCs talk?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Ohhh. Yeah my bad i misread. I forgot how to do that.

I used to know how to do it, this method always proved useless, have a go with it:

public void sendMessageNPC(String message, String NpcName, int npctalk) { sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(NpcName, 4884); sendFrame126(message, 4885); sendFrame126(message, 4882); sendFrame75(npctalk, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; }

Try:

case 155:

if(NPCID == npcid) {
sendMessageToNpc(“etc”);
}

You have to make options though.

SelectOption Method.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you make NPCs talk?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Yes it is.

Maybe you should search…

public void process() {

In Npchandler.java

and scroll about 100 to 200 lines.

The lines could vary, because i don’t use npchandler to make my npcs talk. So i don’t exactly know where it is anymore.

But just scroll. Its not far down.
